trans-unit.source: Defines a geometric shape, described using a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義幾何形狀 (使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext" /> 來描述)。

trans-unit.source: This geometry is light-weight alternative to <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry" />: it does not support data binding, animation, or modification.
trans-unit.target: 這個幾何是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry" /> 的輕量替代，後者不支援資料繫結 (Data Binding)、動畫或修改。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> when you need to describe a complex geometry but do not want the overhead of supporting data binding, animation, or modification.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>何時該添來描述複雜的幾何，但不是想支援資料繫結、 動畫或修改的額外負荷。

trans-unit.source: Because of its efficiency, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> class is a good choice for describing adorners.
trans-unit.target: 其效率，因為<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>類別是用來描述裝飾項不錯的選擇。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> cannot be serialized if it contains a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform> or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>如果它包含無法序列化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Transform>或任何非圖案或區段遭拒。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Freezable 功能

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry> is a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> type.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry>是<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>型別。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML Attribute Usage

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *moveAndDrawCommands*
trans-unit.target: *moveAndDrawCommands*

trans-unit.source: One or more move and draw commands.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個移動和繪製命令。

trans-unit.source: See [Path Markup Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[路徑標記語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 類別的新的空執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that is exactly large enough to contain this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，它剛好可以包含這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" />。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 的週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: This method does not take any pen into account when calculating the geometry's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會考慮任何筆計算幾何的範圍時。

trans-unit.source: Removes all geometric information from this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" />.
trans-unit.target: 將所有幾何資訊從這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 中移除。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the intersecting areas contained in this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，以決定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 包含之交集區域的組合方式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the intersecting areas of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 之交集區域的組合方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>EvenOdd</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>EvenOdd</c>。

trans-unit.source: **EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses.
trans-unit.target: **EvenOdd**會從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠，並且計算給定圖案與光線相交的路徑線段數目來判斷"「 向內程度 」 的圖形上的點。

trans-unit.source: If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個數字是奇數，該點即是在區域內；如為偶數，該點即在區域外。

trans-unit.source: **NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
trans-unit.target: **為非零，** "朝 」 圖形上的某個點決定從該點朝任意方向繪製無限遠，然後檢查圖案線段與光線相交的地方。

trans-unit.source: Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 從零開始計算，路徑線段每次從左到右與光線交會就加一，每次從右到左與光線交會就減一。

trans-unit.source: After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 計算交會後，如果結果為零，則點即在路徑外。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: 否則就在路徑內。

trans-unit.source: ![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration")
trans-unit.target: ![填滿規則圖例](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填滿規則圖例")

trans-unit.target: FillRule 範例

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry.FillRule" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry.FillRule" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> describes a geometric shape.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 所描述的是否為幾何形狀。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> describes a geometry shape; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 描述的是幾何形狀則為 **true**，否則為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> contains a curved segment.
trans-unit.target: 判定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 是否包含弧形片段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> object has a curved segment; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 物件具有弧形片段則為 **true**，否則為 **false**。

trans-unit.source: Opens a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext" /> that can be used to describe this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> object's contents.
trans-unit.target: 開啟可用於描述這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext" /> 物件內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext" /> that can be used to describe this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> object's contents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometryContext" />，可用於描述這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.StreamGeometry" /> 物件的內容。
